ratings.comment: Dan is a super nice guy and his lectures are super easy. Although lectures are mandatory, the content is easy to digest and the weekly responses are super easy. This is a very easy A as long as you do the assignments and see the shows.

This class was super low stress and super easy. Attendance for lecture is mandatory but lecture content is not super important. Biggest portion of your grade is attending/watching performances and submitting reactions and responses to other classmates. Make-up assignments are offered but not always free. Overall, easy class and GPA booster.
Decent lecturer but the class is a surefire A if you just show up.

I loved this professor. And as long as you complete all of the work, you should definitely be able to receive the grade that you want. Furthermore, he is very understanding, and you can tell that he wants you to succeed. I enjoyed going to this class, and I would take it again and recommend it to others! This professor was overall great.

As long as you did assignments on time and show up to lecture an A was guaranteed. Took the Comm B portion and LOVED it. Would recommend to everyone and anyone. Nicest, coolest, and kindest professor around.

Cool Class! Consisted of watching theatrical productions both live and recorded, and interviewing various theatre professionals from within and outside of the university. 2 credit section graded only on discussion posts about the interviews and productions, and daily attendance. Only 1 Comm B section offered alongside the large 2 credit lecture.
